catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 548
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: figure standing on lotus leaf; PR arm is bent up at the elbow, with hand loosely fisted, possibly once holding an object; PL arm extended down with middle two fingers drawn in; eyes closed; pointed hat, sash over PL shoulder connecting to petal-like skirt
title: Kannon, the Bodhisattva of Compassion
